explanation: [0-0] On an open dirt field, three men are playing cricket. One man, wearing a yellow short-sleeved athletic top, stands in the distance, ready to bat. The other two men stand in front of him. The man in the middle, wearing a grayish-green short-sleeved T-shirt and reddish-purple pants, stands behind the wickets. The man in front wears an orange short-sleeved T-shirt and purple pants. In the background, there are buildings, trees, and grass. The sky is blue.

The ball hits the wickets. The man in yellow runs over and makes a gesture.
